title: Apollo: GraphQL Now Connects to REST APIs With Little Fuss
author: B Cameron Gain
description: While organizations have long sought to integrate REST APIs with GraphQL, the process of separately integrating each API has remained a widespread and persistent pain point.
cntitle: Apollo：GraphQL 现在可以轻松连接到 REST API
cndescription: 尽管长期以来，各组织一直寻求将 REST API 与 GraphQL 集成，但分别集成每个 API 的过程仍然是一个普遍且持续存在的痛点。
